title: Define Project Requirements - Revised
description: Gather and document comprehensive requirements for the SmartLitterBoxAnalyzer project, including functional and non-functional requirements, user stories, use cases, system performance metrics, security considerations, error handling mechanisms, interface design guidelines, and accessibility requirements. Collaborate with all relevant stakeholders to ensure a holistic approach, engaging team members from various roles such as frontend-developer, backend-developer, database-specialist, devops-engineer, qa-tester, security-specialist, and technical-writer. Ensure that the requirements are testable, traceable, and prioritized. Once the requirements are defined, conduct a review with all stakeholders to gather feedback and make any necessary adjustments before proceeding.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware components, software components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Design Database Schema
description: Design the database schema for storing pet health data, user information, and other relevant data.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services for data processing, analysis, and integration with veterinary systems.

title: Develop Frontend Application
description: Develop the frontend application for users to view pet health reports and manage their accounts.

title: Implement IoT Device Integration
description: Implement the integration between the IoT-enabled litter box and the backend services for data transmission.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Set up a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for automated builds, testing, and deployment.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures for data protection, user authentication, and system hardening.

title: Write Documentation
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance manuals.

title: Conduct Testing
description: Conduct thorough testing of the system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.
